newsitem.title: USA: Safeguard to acquire Advantage Health.
newsitem.headline: Safeguard to acquire Advantage Health.

text.p: Safeguard Health Enterprises Inc Wednesday said it signed a letter of intent to acquire all the issued and outstanding shares of Advantage Dental Health Plans, a privately held dental managed care company based in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, operating in four states and the District of Columbia.

The company said the acquisition is expected to be completed within 90 days. It will add approximately 60,000 members to Safeguard's existing 980,000-member dental network. The cash transaction is subject to the satisfaction of certain conditions, including negotiation and execution of a definitive purchase agreement. Terms were not disclosed.
